h1. Server Log Server Plugin

The Server Log Server Plugin shows you recent activity that has been output to the server log for a specific build server.  

h2. Version

Available from version 1.0

h2. Examples

{code:xml|borderStyle=solid}
<serverLogServerPlugin />
{code}


h2. Configuration Elements

There is no configuration for this plugin.

h2. Notes

Read the [Server Application Config File] page for more help on build server logging.
